extendedInfo.description: FamilyGTG app allows you to build your family tree or import your family's GEDCOM file so you can easily check your family while you are on the go.- Create new family tree directly from the device.- Import GEDCOM genealogy files easily (GEDCOM Viewer) [1].- Add and remove family members, and set relations between them.- Search family members by name.- View member's full profile: relatives, personal info, and photo.- Add, change, or remove member photos.- Edit member information (name, birth, note, etc.).- Show descendants & ancestors tree for a specific member[2].- Add a member to bookmarks list for easy reference later[3].- Browse family photo gallery.- Show statistics about the family tree.- Sample family tree can be optionally downloaded.- Free version app with no time limitation and ads-free.[1] One active family at a time (check full version for unlimited families).[2] Limited tree navigation (check full version for unlimited navigation).[3] One bookmark (check full version for unlimited bookmarks).GEDCOM (GEnealogical Data COMmunication) files can be created by any desktop software. Send the file to your device via any method: bluetooth, ... etc. FamilyGTG then scans your phone for any GEDCOM files (with .ged extention) so they can be imported.Check FamilyGTG full version app ($3 USD) for no limitations.

reviews.title: Reasonable - could do better
reviews.comment: Some obvious coding shortcomings make the import of gedcom files unnecessarily complex. The app doesn\'t install itself as a default handler for .GED files.  This makes the display of cloud-based trees a three-step process.  On the other hand, this is a good way to display a tree on a tablet.   With a bit of tweaking I would be prepared to go for the paid version.
reviews.author: Martin Gray

reviews.title: Excellent Gedcom Viewer.
reviews.comment: Simple but displays info nicely. Very easy and intuitive UI where you can click any name of parents, siblings, or children to navigate around quickly. I\'m using it just as a viewer only but data is editable so great for research at family events. Works great and is free. (I do wish the tree view included the spouse of the selected individual).
reviews.author: Mike Sussman

reviews.title: Not too bad
reviews.comment: A little clumsy to navigate around.  Biggest gripe is that marriage dates don\'t show.
reviews.author: Don Frerichs

reviews.title: Just installed..
reviews.comment: I was able to import GED file with no issues, seems quite OK.
reviews.author: Voytek Eymont

reviews.title: Not bad for a new app, but needs work
reviews.comment: Does not handle multiple spouses. Shows descendants tree but not ancestor tree. No birth, death, marriage dates on family summary page (you have to go to a different page, even if the was plenty of space on the big tablet screen). Tree view truncates names. Good enough to play with but not to buy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boring
reviews.comment: First of all you need to make a family tree first because I didnt and it said I couldn\'t make a family tree so I couldnt find anybody
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Same comments as prior commenter plus does not correctly interpret adoptions as in the case of grandmother adopting grandchild. Doesn\'t show spouses.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: J\303\270rn L\303\270kjen
reviews.comment: Looking forward to adding new people. And should be able to bavigate the tree by swiping and pinching...
reviews.author: J\303\270rn L\303\270kken
